manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
- Enabled suggested music in stories
- Added secret notes (feature not functional yet)
- Introduced suggestions filter in the Explore tab
- Added effects button to the story camera sidebar
- Updated notification swipe action icon
- Restored the notification bell icon
- Improved direct photo upload quality
- Refined audio attribution format
- Updated and clarified timestamps
- Refreshed outdated flags
- Disabled footer mute controls
- Disabled full-screen Reels view
- Resolved "Reels unavailable" issue
- Fixed minor bugs and improved performance
- Some internal changes (details not remembered)
manifest.name: Zain's Backup
manifest.description: This backup maked for the newest features!
